package_affected.distribution_affected: jessie), these problems have been fixed in version 9.1.16-0+deb8u1. (Jessie contains a reduced postgresql-9.1 package; only CVE-2015-3166 is fixed in the produced binary package postgresql-plperl-9.1. We recommend to upgrade to postgresql-9.4 to get the full set of fixes. See the Jessie release notes for details.
package_affected.fixed in: 9.1.16-0+deb8u1. (Jessie contains a reduced postgresql-9.1 package; only CVE-2015-3166 is fixed in the produced binary package postgresql-plperl-9.1. We recommend to upgrade to postgresql-9.4 to get the full set of fixes. See the Jessie release notes for details.)
